slides.text_to_tts: Что, если твой дом – это не просто стены? Что, если он помнит все, но постоянно забывает и переписывает?
slides.z_image_prompt: cinematic photograph of a solitary, dusty, chipped enamel teapot, centered on an old gas stove in a dimly lit, rundown Soviet-era kitchen. The teapot has subtle, ghostly, translucent outlines of previous positions faintly visible around it, hinting at constant movement. The focus is solely on the teapot, clearly separated from the background. Superimposed at the TOP of the image in a bold, glitched, slightly distressed font: 'ИСТОРИЯ ПЕРЕЗАПИСАНА' -- moody, atmospheric, dark, analog horror, post-soviet aesthetic

slides.text_to_tts: В Квартире-Архиве каждый предмет – живет своей жизнью. Твоя любимая кружка... она никогда не будет на одном месте больше часа.
slides.z_image_prompt: dramatic photograph of a single, worn, post-Soviet era slipper, centered, inexplicably hanging perfectly still in mid-air from a stained, concrete ceiling in a sparse, decaying apartment room. The slipper is the clear focal point, well-defined against the softly blurred, grunge texture of the ceiling and wall. -- enigmatic, cinematic, atmospheric, analog horror, post-soviet.

slides.text_to_tts: Не только предметы. Кажется, меняется и сама память. Фотографии на стене... кто этот человек?
slides.z_image_prompt: cinematic close-up of a solitary, vintage framed family photograph, centered on a peeling, discolored wallpapered wall. Within the photo, a person's face is subtly distorted with analog glitched lines, or a figure is faintly superimposed and partially transparent. The photograph itself is the dominant object, sharply in focus, contrasting with the blurred, textured background of the old wall. -- eerie, unsettling, analog horror, post-soviet.

slides.text_to_tts: Постоянное ощущение, что стены дышат, а мебель следит. Каждый час – новая версия реальности.
slides.z_image_prompt: atmospheric shot of a solitary, worn, floral-patterned armchair, centered in a dimly lit, cluttered corner of a post-Soviet apartment. The armchair casts an unnaturally long and distorted shadow that seems to subtly ripple on the wall. The armchair is clearly the main object, sharply defined against a softly blurred background of dusty books and old wallpaper. -- dark, eerie, analog horror, unsettling, post-soviet.

slides.text_to_tts: Иногда ты просыпаешься... и не можешь понять, это твой дом, или чья-то чужая, постоянно переписываемая история?
slides.z_image_prompt: eerie cinematic shot of a solitary, faded, geometric patterned Soviet-era carpet (kovyor), centered on a wooden floor in an empty, dimly lit room. The carpet appears perfectly normal, but there are multiple faint, almost imperceptible ghosted outlines of identical carpets faintly visible around it on the floor, suggesting past positions. The carpet is the clear, distinct main object, set against a simple, softly blurred wooden floor and featureless wall. -- mysterious, atmospheric, analog horror, post-soviet.
